txt.en: Thangaran is an apprentice to the master of Dol Guldur in all things.
The mistress of the tower, Iaerien, is a woman scorned by good and embraced by evil.
The tower is the pinnacle of the fortress of Dol Guldur. Its terrible shadow casts darkness and dread over the forests of Mirkwood.
Hogaward is an emissary from the less organized brigand groups infesting the lands around Bree.
Múdku is fiercely protective of his weapons, even the dull, rusted ones.
Blord is not often allowed within the tower...his very footsteps cause the foundations to shudder.
Gundnákh is not the fastest of trolls, but eventually he will always catch up to his prey.
Gadhumúrz is one of the hunting Wargs of the tower's master. He feasts on the remains of all that he catches.
Urbor is curiously fascinated by flames of a blue nature.
Complete everything in the Battle in the Tower Skirmish
